scripts.build: npm run schema & npm i -g --force & raml2html api_docs/planmill1_5.raml > api_docs/index.html
scripts.patch: npm run build & npm version patch & npm publish
scripts.schema: dt2js ./api_docs/planmill1_5.raml account_getAll > ./api_docs/account_getAll.schema & dt2js ./api_docs/planmill1_5.raml account_getId > ./api_docs/account_getId.schema & dt2js ./api_docs/planmill1_5.raml account_post > ./api_docs/account_post.schema & dt2js ./api_docs/planmill1_5.raml account_postId > ./api_docs/account_postId.schema
